column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Service was very friendly
column2: though not the most efficient. At the counter
column3: things slowed down terribly when the attendants wrote down your order on a ticket
column4: kindly answered any questions you may have about the plethora of baked goods
column5: and then finally filled your bag/box with the goodies you had ordered. (They'll take your entree and drink order upfront
column6: too!). Once paying for your goodies
column7: you receive a number and your baked goods to find a seat in the dining area. The waiters were very nice and made sure you had everything you need
column8: although ours had a few mixups with our drink order (hopefully it's just an opening weekend thing...). For drinks
column9: I highly recommend the caramel latte (best we've had in Houston) and the orange juice (very small serving
